creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: Circular brass form with original peach colored lining; attached coin purse - French designer
text: Handbags were a way for modern women to reflect current trends with ever-changing accessories that accompanied them in public. Increased income supported multiple design choices that celebrated the present, with forms and materials seen in industrial manufacturing and referencing fast-paced modern life. Whether its wearer was working, shopping, or dancing, handbags such as these would have perfectly accompanied the loose-fitting dresses of the 1920s and â€™30s.
title: Purse
